results.title: Metformin suppresses phenylephrine-induced hypertrophic responses by inhibiting p300-HAT activity in cardiomyocytes.
results.text_hl: PURPOSE: The purpose of this study was to investigate whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ leads to suppression of @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002312 @@@hypertrophic@@@ responses in cardiomyocytes.

results.title: Effects of the peripheral CB1 receptor antagonist JD5037 in mono: and polytherapy with the AMPK activator metformin in a monocrotaline-induced rat model of pulmonary hypertension
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Monocrotaline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016686 @@@Monocrotaline@@@ (60 mg/kg) increased right ventricular (RV) systolic pressure (RVSP), led to @DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Right_Ventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D017380 @@@RV and lung hypertrophy and remodeling@@@, and decreased @CHEMICAL_Oxygen @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010100 @@@oxygen@@@ saturation. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ partially restored the @CHEMICAL_Monocrotaline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016686 @@@monocrotaline@@@-induced effects, i.e., decreased RVSP, increased @CHEMICAL_Oxygen @CHEMICAL_MESH:D010100 @@@oxygen@@@ saturation, and counteracted cardiac fibrotic, @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002312 @@@hypertrophic@@@, and @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ changes.

results.title: Features of BSCL2 related congenital generalized lipodystrophy in China: long-term follow-up of three patients and literature review.
results.text_hl: Although combined therapy with low fat diet and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ maintained normal levels of blood @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@, this @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ developed @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002312 @@@hypertrophic cardiomyopathy@@@ at the age of three.

results.title: Metformin Protects the Heart Against Hypertrophic and Apoptotic Remodeling After Myocardial Infarction
results.text_hl: In the first set of experiments, we investigated whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ affects metabolic- or oxidative stress-induced @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002312 @@@hypertrophic@@@ responses in vitro.

results.title: Metformin blunts muscle hypertrophy in response to progressive resistance exercise training in older adults: A randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, multicenter trial: The MASTERS trial
results.text_hl: These results underscore the benefits of PRT in older adults, but @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ negatively impacts the @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002312 @@@hypertrophic@@@ response to resistance training in healthy older individuals.
